title: Bovada Announces New Full Bankroll Bonus for their Welcome Bonus Policy Amendment
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Bovada Sportsbook announces the change in their Welcome Bonus policy from 50% initial deposit in free bets to full bankroll bonus. Hence, players don’t need to keep their risk money when using free bet bonuses. However, the full bankroll bonus will help players to keep their risk money and winnings in their bankroll whenever they win the bets.
Being a trusted and reliable online sports book across the globe, Bovada don’t actually offer bigger welcome bonuses unlike other sports books just to entice new players. The latest bankroll bonus in fact started from the visitors of Sports betting news site called Betting411.com and eventually expanded into more websites.
The importance of knowing where to go for online betting remains a fundamental concern for gamblers who want entertainment and want to win money at the same time. There is an increasing number of websites that actually promote unreliable online betting sites in order to make money. But Bovada stands firm that they are trustworthy and only aims to provide customers with fun and exciting sports betting experience.
“Gambling should be entertaining. Remember that you always risk losing the money you bet, so do not spend more than you can afford to lose,” Bovada advised the players of online sports betting website worldwide.
The company also encouraged players to be vigilant when choosing a betting website since most of the ones listed on Google are not completely reliable. However, Bovada believes that staying true with their customers help them to become one of the trusted few that provides people the best sports betting entertainment while offering great opportunities in winning bets.
“We are strongly committed to ensure that players find the ultimate site which can satisfy their needs with excellent bonuses that can make their games more fun and exciting. In fact, the new bankroll bonus that we are offering will give you more opportunities to win,” they added.
Meanwhile, they simply want to let players know that it’s better to be keen in sports betting than become a victim of scams from online gambling. This is an issue that they want to eradicate on the web and make sure that online gamblers from legit sports betting websites take advantage of more reliable and affordable sportsbook.
